name: shr_id
desc: Identifier for SHR master file

name: state_code
desc: Numeric state code

name: ori_code
desc: Originating agency ID

name: geo_group
desc: MSA or other geographic grouping

name: division
desc: Geographic division

name: year
desc: Year the data reflects

name: population
desc: Total population for the agency for the year reported

name: county
desc: County code in which the city is located

name: msa
desc: Metropolitan Statistical Area number in which the city is located

name: msa_ind
desc: Suburban vs. non-suburban

name: agency_name
desc: Agency name

name: state_name
desc: State name

name: offense_month
desc: The month (1-12) in which the offense occurred

name: last_update
desc: The date the record was last updated

name: action_type
desc: The type of action on the record

name: homicide
desc: The type of offense (Murder and non-negligent manslaughter vs. manslaughter by negligence)

name: incident_number
desc: A unique number that distinguishes one incident from another within the ORI

name: situation
desc: Describes the data relative to the number of victims/offenders in each incident

name: victim_age
desc: The age of the victim

name: victim_sex
desc: The sex of the victim

name: victim_race
desc: The race of the victim

name: victim_ethnicity
desc: The ethnicity of the victim

name: offender_age
desc: The age of the offender

name: offender_sex
desc: The sex of the offender

name: offender_race
desc: The race of the offender

name: offender_ethnicity
desc: The ethnicity of the offender

name: offender_weapon_used
desc: The weapon used by the offender

name: offender_relationship
desc: The relationship between the victim and offender

name: offender_circumstance
desc: The circumstances under which the incident occurred

name: offender_subcircumstance
desc: Additional detail type used for certain circumstance codes

name: victim_count
desc: The number of additional victims, if any

name: offender_count
desc: The number of additional offenders, if any
